00012 class SVDCompleteIncrementalLearning
00013 {
00014  public:
00015   SVDCompleteIncrementalLearning(double u = 0.0001,
00016                                  double kw = 0,
00017                                  double kh = 0)
00018             : u(u), kw(kw), kh(kh)
00019     {}

00021   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00022   {
00023     (void)rank;
00024     n = dataset.n_rows;
00025     m = dataset.n_cols;
00026 
00027     currentUserIndex = 0;
00028     currentItemIndex = 0;
00029   }
00030 
00055   inline void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00056                       arma::mat& W,
00057                       const arma::mat& H)
00058   {
00059     arma::mat deltaW(1, W.n_cols);
00060     deltaW.zeros();
00061     while(true)
00062     {
00063       double val;
00064       if((val = V(currentItemIndex, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00065       {
00066         deltaW += (val - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00067                                         * arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00068         if(kw != 0) deltaW -= kw * W.row(currentItemIndex);
00069         break;
00070       }
00071       currentUserIndex = currentUserIndex + 1;
00072       if(currentUserIndex == n)
00073       {
00074         currentUserIndex = 0;
00075         currentItemIndex = (currentItemIndex + 1) % m;
00076       }
00077     }
00078 
00079     W.row(currentItemIndex) += u*deltaW;
00080   }
00081 
00091   inline void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00092                       const arma::mat& W,
00093                       arma::mat& H)
00094   {
00095     arma::mat deltaH(H.n_rows, 1);
00096     deltaH.zeros();
00097 
00098     while(true)
00099     {
00100       double val;
00101       if((val = V(currentItemIndex, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00102       deltaH += (val - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00103                                       * arma::trans(W.row(currentItemIndex));
00104       if(kh != 0) deltaH -= kh * H.col(currentUserIndex);
00105 
00106       currentUserIndex = currentUserIndex + 1;
00107       if(currentUserIndex == n)
00108       {
00109         currentUserIndex = 0;
00110         currentItemIndex = (currentItemIndex + 1) % m;
00111       }
00112     }
00113 
00114     H.col(currentUserIndex++) += u * deltaH;
00115   }
00116 
00117  private:
00118   double u;
00119   double kw;
00120   double kh;
00121 
00122   size_t n;
00123   size_t m;
00124 
00125   size_t currentUserIndex;
00126   size_t currentItemIndex;
00127 };

00144   void Initialize(const arma::sp_mat& dataset, const size_t rank)
00145   {
00146     (void)rank;
00147     n = dataset.n_rows;
00148     m = dataset.n_cols;
00149 
00150     it = new arma::sp_mat::const_iterator(dataset.begin());
00151     isStart = true;

00163   inline void WUpdate(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00164                       arma::mat& W,
00165                       const arma::mat& H)
00166   {
00167     if(!isStart) (*it)++;
00168     else isStart = false;
00169 
00170     if(*it == V.end())
00171     {
00172         delete it;
00173         it = new arma::sp_mat::const_iterator(V.begin());
00174     }
00175 
00176     size_t currentUserIndex = it->col();
00177     size_t currentItemIndex = it->row();
00178 
00179     arma::mat deltaW(1, W.n_cols);
00180     deltaW.zeros();
00181 
00182     deltaW += (**it - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00183                                       * arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00184     if(kw != 0) deltaW -= kw * W.row(currentItemIndex);
00185 
00186     W.row(currentItemIndex) += u*deltaW;
00187   }
00188 
00198   inline void HUpdate(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00199                       const arma::mat& W,
00200                       arma::mat& H)
00201   {
00202     (void)V;
00203   
00204     arma::mat deltaH(H.n_rows, 1);
00205     deltaH.zeros();
00206 
00207     size_t currentUserIndex = it->col();
00208     size_t currentItemIndex = it->row();
00209 
00210     deltaH += (**it - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00211                                         * arma::trans(W.row(currentItemIndex));
00212     if(kh != 0) deltaH -= kh * H.col(currentUserIndex);
00213 
00214     H.col(currentUserIndex++) += u * deltaH;
00215   }
00216

00219   double kw;
